name: Solo Leveling Figurine
description: Unleash the Shadow Monarch:  This epic Solo Leveling figurine brings your favorite hunter to life! (great for fans of Sung Jin-Woo)

name: Mini Solo Leveling Model
description: Power Up Your Collection: Take home a mini Solo Leveling model and relive the thrilling battles! (perfect for displaying on desks or shelves)

name: LED Light Solo Leveling
description: Light Up the Night:  This anime LED light featuring Solo Leveling will illuminate your room with hunter-grade style! (unique collectible and conversation starter)
